Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开新窗口
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open a new window

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在无痕模式下打开新窗口
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open a new window in Incognito mode

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开新的标签页，并跳转到该标签页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open a new tab, and jump to it

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 按标签页的关闭顺序重新打开先前关闭的标签页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Reopen previously closed tabs in the order they were closed

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 跳转到下一个打开的标签页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Jump to the next open tab

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 跳转到下一个打开的标签页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Jump to the next open tab

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 跳转到上一个打开的标签页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Jump to the previous open tab

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 跳转到上一个打开的标签页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Jump to the previous open tab

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 跳转到特定标签页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Jump to a specific tab

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 跳转到最右侧的那个标签页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Jump to the rightmost tab

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在当前标签页中打开主页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open your home page in the current tab

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开当前标签页浏览记录中记录的上一个页面
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the previous page from your browsing history in the current tab

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开当前标签页浏览记录中记录的下一个页面
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the next page from your browsing history in the current tab

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 关闭当前标签页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Close the current tab

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 关闭当前标签页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Close the current tab

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 关闭当前窗口
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Close the current window

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 关闭当前窗口
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Close the current window

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 最小化当前窗口
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Minimize the current window

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 最大化当前窗口
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Maximize the current window

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 退出 Google Chrome
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Quit Google Chrome

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 使用键盘焦点向右或向左移动标签页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move tabs right or left with keyboard focus

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开 Chrome 菜单
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Chrome menu

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开 Chrome 菜单
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Chrome menu

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 显示或隐藏书签栏
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Show or hide the Bookmarks bar

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开书签管理器
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Bookmarks Manager

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在新标签页中打开“历史记录”页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the History page in a new tab

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在新标签页中打开“下载内容”页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Downloads page in a new tab

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开 Chrome 任务管理器
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Chrome Task Manager

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将焦点放置在 Chrome 工具栏中的第一项上
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Set focus on the first item in the Chrome toolbar

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将焦点放置在 Chrome 工具栏中最右侧的那一项上
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Set focus on the rightmost item in the Chrome toolbar

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将焦点移到未聚焦的对话框（如果显示）或所有工具栏
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Switch focus to unfocused dialog (if showing) and all toolbars

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开查找栏搜索当前网页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Find Bar to search the current page

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开查找栏搜索当前网页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Find Bar to search the current page

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 跳转到与查找栏中搜索字词相匹配的下一条内容
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Jump to the next match to your Find Bar search

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 跳转到与查找栏中搜索字词相匹配的上一条内容
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Jump to the previous match to your Find Bar search

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“开发者工具”
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open Developer Tools

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“开发者工具”
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open Developer Tools

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“清除浏览数据”选项
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Clear Browsing Data options

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在新标签页中打开 Chrome 帮助中心
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Chrome Help Center in a new tab

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 使用其他帐号登录或以访客身份浏览
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Log in a different user or browse as a Guest

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开反馈表单
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open a feedback form

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 开启光标浏览模式
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Turn on caret browsing

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 跳至网页内容
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Skip to web contents

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将焦点移到非使用中的对话框
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Focus on inactive dialogs

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 使用默认搜索引擎进行搜索
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Search with your default search engine

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 使用其他搜索引擎进行搜索
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Search using a different search engine

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 为网站名称添加 www. 和 .com，然后在当前标签页中打开该网址
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Add www. and .com to a site name, and open it in the current tab

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开新的标签页并执行 Google 搜索
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open a new tab and perform a Google search

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 跳转到地址栏
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Jump to the address bar

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 跳转到地址栏
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Jump to the address bar

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 跳转到地址栏
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Jump to the address bar

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 从页面中的任意位置搜索
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Search from anywhere on the page

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 从页面中的任意位置搜索
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Search from anywhere on the page

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 从地址栏中移除联想查询内容
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Remove predictions from your address bar

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开选项以打印当前网页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open options to print the current page

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开选项以保存当前网页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open options to save the current page

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 重新加载当前网页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Reload the current page

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 重新加载当前网页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Reload the current page

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 重新加载当前网页（忽略缓存的内容）
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Reload the current page, ignoring cached content

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 重新加载当前网页（忽略缓存的内容）
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Reload the current page, ignoring cached content

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 停止加载网页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Stop the page loading

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 浏览下一个可点击项
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Browse clickable items moving forward

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 浏览上一个可点击项
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Browse clickable items moving backward

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 使用 Chrome 打开计算机中的文件
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open a file from your computer in Chrome

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 显示当前网页的 HTML 源代码（不可修改）
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Display non-editable HTML source code for the current page

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将当前网页保存为书签
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Save your current webpage as a bookmark

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将所有打开的标签页以书签的形式保存在新文件夹中
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Save all open tabs as bookmarks in a new folder

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 开启或关闭全屏模式
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Turn full-screen mode on or off

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 放大网页上的所有内容
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Make everything on the page bigger

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 缩小网页上的所有内容
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Make everything on the page smaller

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将网页上的所有内容恢复到默认大小
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Return everything on the page to default size

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 向下滚动网页，一次一个屏幕
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Scroll down a webpage, a screen at a time

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 向上滚动网页，一次一个屏幕
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Scroll up a webpage, a screen at a time

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 转到网页顶部
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Go to the top of the page

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 转到网页底部
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Go to the bottom of the page

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在网页上水平滚动
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Scroll horizontally on the page

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将光标移到文本字段中的上一个字词起始处
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move your cursor to the beginning of the previous word in a text field

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将光标移到下一个字词起始处
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move your cursor to the next word

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 删除文本字段中的上一个字词
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Delete the previous word in a text field

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在当前标签页中打开主页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Home page in the current tab

Keys.ShortcutKey: Drag a link to a tab
Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在当前标签页中打开链接（仅限鼠标）
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open a link in a current tab (mouse only)

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在新的后台标签页中打开链接
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open a link in new background tab

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开链接，并跳转到该链接
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open a link, and jump to it

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开链接，并跳转到该链接（仅使用鼠标）
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open a link, and jump to it (mouse only)

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在新窗口中打开链接
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open a link in a new window

Keys.ShortcutKey: Drag tab out of the tab strip
Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在新窗口中打开标签页（仅使用鼠标）
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open a tab in a new window (mouse only)

Keys.ShortcutKey: Drag tab into an existing window
Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将标签页移至当前窗口（仅限鼠标）
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move a tab to a current window (mouse only)

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将标签页移回其原始位置
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Return a tab to its original position

Keys.ShortcutKey: Drag address to the Bookmarks Bar
Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将当前网页保存为书签
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Save the current webpage as a bookmark

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在网页上水平滚动
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Scroll horizontally on the page

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 下载链接目标
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Download the target of a link

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 放大网页上的所有内容
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Make everything on the page bigger

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 缩小网页上的所有内容
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Make everything on the page smaller
